price: 107. Y aquellos de rostros iluminados entrarán en la misericordia de Al-lah (el paraíso), y allí vivirán eternamente.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna ib'yaḍḍat wujūhuhum fafī raḥmati al-lahi hum fīhā khālidūna
